8-bit Book Club https://www.8bitbookclub.com en Creative Commons Each season we read a vintage programming book and discuss it as we go. Read along with us! Or just listen in as we learn things we should have learned 30 years ago.
https://www.8bitbookclub.com/podcast/logo.jpg 8-bit Book Club https://www.8bitbookclub.com
serial Catching up with 1980's programming, one book at a time 8-bit Book Club Each season we read a vintage programming book and discuss it as we go. Read along with us! Or just listen in as we learn things we should have learned 30 years ago. Season 1 of 8-bit Book Club is all about the Commodore 64 Programmer's Reference Guide.
john@retronerd.com
